column4: is it a lengthy process to get a usb hd recognized so i can access the media on it?
did something show you it was autodetected as soon as you plugged it in
don't remember, but if you're using gnome, check in the places menu for a XXgb volume
i dont know how to check /media
but it doesnt list a usbdisk
hmm, then i'm outta my league :(
i know it shows up in GNOME no problem.. pops right up on the desktop
might have to do w/ dbus and hal... maybe somewhere to look
they are some things for hardware abstraction and 'i think' hardware autodetection
like i said, im probably not the best person to help you
